title: Highest earning eSports countries in 2018 , by prize winnings
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Prize money in million U.S. dollars 28.07 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 4.16.
There is a difference of 23.91 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Germany.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The Prize money in million U.S. dollars is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Germany.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Prize money in million U.S. dollars 28.07 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 4.16.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Prize money in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Prize money in million U.S. dollars 28.07 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 4.16.
Country United States has 6.75 times more Prize money in million U.S. dollars than Country Germany which is has the lowest.
The Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars, followed by China, and South Korea. Down to the Country Germany which is the lowest.
The Country Germany has 2.72 times less Prize money in million U.S. dollars than average.
